pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, November 9, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Boris Johnson.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry Navdeep Bains, Minister for Women and Gender Equality and Rural Economic Development Maryam Monsef, Minister of Infrastructure and Communities Catherine McKenna, and Leader of the Government in the House of Commons Pablo Rodriguez. A media availability will follow.

Room 200
Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual meeting with faith and anti-racism organizations on combatting hate groups. He will be joined by Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness Bill Blair and Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Justice and Attorney General of Canada Arif Virani.

Closed to media.
